ovdesc.p: Used to trigger the bulk transfer all accounts and contracts for applications defined on STANDARD.MAPPING from one company to another.
Setting up this table will trigger the automatic creation of EB.COMPANY.CHANGE records to generate the transfer.

desc.p: The company from which accounts and contracts are to be transferred.
The company to which accounts and contracts are to be transferred.
The effective date of the transfer.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
